summary:
Model and texture edit for Amulet of Talos. -Polished Edition!
For the Dragonborn who likes to keep their stuff looking nice.
descriptionHtml:
[center][/center][img]http://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/images/110/25153174-1447816787.jpg[/img]

Summary
===========

[size=3]Model and texture edit for Amulet of Talos. Polished Edition!

Edited the mesh and texture for the Amulet of Talos. New, polished metal look and no more "nub" on the end. For the Dragonborn who likes to keep their stuff looking nice. :)[/size]


Install
=======
1. Extract the files to a temporary location.
2. Copy files to (install folder)\Skyrim\Data\

Optional Mod Organizer install:
1. Open archive with Mod Organizer
2. Select data folder
3. Install

Uninstall
=========
1. Delete any folders associated with this mod
or
Remove with Mod Organizer.

This mod does not alter the Amulet of Talos powers, only the 3D mesh and textures.


Contact
=======

Skyrim Nexus @ AshAuryn

Credits
=======

Re-imagined from Amulet of Talos design by Ghosu
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51870/]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51870/[/url]

Thank you to the nexus community for providing this opportunity and to Bethesda for creating a game that I have spent more hours playing than any other game in my life. :)

Tools Used
==========
NifSkope
GIMP
